title: Homes Destroyed & Three People Missing As Victoria Faces A Catastrophic Bushfire Crisis | 10 News
description: Victoria's catastrophic fire crisis appears to have taken a deadly turn with three people - including a child - missing after their home went up in flames.  Intense bushfires have been driven by wild winds, and temperatures topping 46 degrees. title: Several Luxury Yachts Destroyed In Sydney As Fire Rips Through Mosman Marina | 10 News

title: Three Missing In Victoria As Firefighters Battle 40 Bushfires Across State | 10 News+
description: Catastrophic bushfires are wreaking havoc across Victoria’s north, east and west as 700 firefighters battle to contain them.   Dozens of towns are under emergency warnings and evacuation orders, with conditions described as being similar to the Black Summer bushfires of 2019-20.   The Longwood fire has consumed a community centre and multiple homes in the township of Ruffy, and three people are missing in Longwood East - last seen standing outside their home as the flames approached. title: What Will The Royal Commission Into Antisemitism In Australia Achieve? | 10 News+
description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has performed a political backflip, announcing a Royal Commission into the Bondi Beach attack after weeks of pressure.   So what is a Royal Commission, and what will this one achieve? A Royal Commission is Australia’s highest form of public inquiry, and there have been 140 since Federation, looking at subjects such as police corruption, institutional child abuse, and financial mismanagement.   This specific one will examine four key areas: the prevalence of antisemitism, how law enforcement will respond to antisemitism, the circumstances surrounding the Bondi attack, and how to strengthen social cohesion. title: Catastrophic Victoria Bushfires, Royal Commission Explained, Politicians Spending Scandal | 10 News+
description: Catastrophic bushfires are wreaking havoc across Victoria’s north, east and west as 700 firefighters battle to contain them. Dozens of towns are under emergency warnings and evacuation orders, with conditions described as being similar to the Black Summer bushfires of 2019-20. The Longwood fire has consumed a community centre and multiple homes in the township of Ruffy, and three people are missing in Longwood East - last seen standing outside their home as the flames approached.  Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has performed a political backflip, announcing a Royal Commission into the Bondi Beach attack after weeks of pressure. So what is a Royal Commission, and what will this one achieve? A Royal Commission is Australia’s highest form of public inquiry, and there have been 140 since Federation, looking at subjects such as police corruption, institutional child abuse, and financial mismanagement. This specific one will examine four key areas: the prevalence of antisemitism, how law enforcement will respond to antisemitism, the circumstances surrounding the Bondi attack, and how to strengthen social cohesion.  Federal politicians have been accused of paying off their own mortgages with taxpayer dollars. Under the current rules, it is legal for MPs to use their travel allowance even when staying in homes in Canberra owned by themselves or their spouses. Unlike other Australian cities which have two rates for travel allowances, Canberra has a single flat rate, allowing politicians to claim the same amount even if they aren’t spending money on a hotel room. title: LIVE: Premier And Emergency Chiefs Provide Update On Current Fires And Conditions | 10 News
description: Victoria Premier Jacinta Allan and senior emergency chiefs are providing an urgent update on the state’s heatwave and bushfire emergency, as a Statewide Total Fire Ban comes into force today following fires sparked by yesterday’s catastrophic conditions.

title: Major Fires Burn Across Victoria, Emergency Warnings And Home Losses Mount | 10 News
description: A severe and terrifying bushfire emergency is continuing to unfold across Victoria.  A wind change whipped up flames near Harcourt, and the Premier has declared a State of Disaster in the early hours of this morning.  These are the major fires burning right now, with the greatest concern at Longwood and Ravenswood, as well as a fire on the border with New South Wales.  Around 50 homes and buildings have been destroyed at Ravenswood and a further 30 at Longwood. title: Critical Comms Cut In Townsville As Cyclone Warning Issued For North Queensland | 10 News

title: Iran Protests Enter 13th Night As Regime Attacks Demonstrators, Trump Threatens Action | 10 News
